caption.p: Eucalyptol (violet colour ball and stick model) interactions with M Pro represented in (A) solid ribbon model with; (B) active site amino acid residues amino acid residues represented in red colour line model; (C) hydrophobic interactions (alkyl and pi-alkyl are shown in light pink colour dotted lines; pi-sigma interactions are shown in dark purple), van der Waals interactions (light green colour circles).
